casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Vincent HAYES. No. 474P11-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Charles Vincent Hayes, Lumberton, for Hayes, Charles Vincent. Pat Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of December 2014 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
